question:
Consider the following climatic conditions (northern hemisphere):
  Temperature
°C 		Rainfall
cm
January 3.9 4.7
February 4.4 5.7
March 8.3 8.2
April 14.4 9.2
May 20.0 9.2
June 23.3 17.7
July 27.8 14.5
August 27.8 14.0
September 22.3 12.7
October 18.3 7.0
November 12.2 5.0
December 6.7 3.5
These are most likely to be found in the natural regions of
explanation: In the west of China, there are two types of climate, temperate continental climate and plateau climate and highland climate. Most regions are cold and dry in winter and have a warm and rainy climate in summer. The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau in the southwest has a highland climate with a low temperature throughout the year.
